Eat This! Version: 1.0 Eat This! is a school project mobile application that picks a restaurant for you based on your location. Team: MDS Developers - Ang Wei Xiang Darren - Chua Ming Kiang - Stanley Cheong Guo Hao Description Having troubles deciding what to eat? Let this app help you! Switch on your GPS or key in your location and we will choose a suitable place for you to eat nearby. Never will you have to wreck your brains about meals ever again! Unable to use GPS without Permissions
